inlineContent.text: Manage, display, and create your custom advertisements on iOS using cutting-edge technologies such as Combine, Modern Concurrency, and SwiftUI based on the AdSDK.
In this section, you will learn how to create, display, and manage advertisements using AdSDK.

chapters.name: Working with the built-in capabilities of the SDK

abstract.text: This tutorial will teach you how to define the size of the advertisement, taking into account the aspect ratio parameter. In it, we will continue the development of the application we started in the previous section.

abstract.text: This tutorial will help you observe and respond to changes in the state and events of advertisements. In it, we will continue the development of the application we started in the previous section.
